description: This rule checks to make sure the required field `@timestamp` is present.
name: ECS Check: @timestamp required field
query: not @timestamp:*

description: This rule checks to make sure the required field `ecs.version` is present.
name: ECS Check: ecs.version required field
query: not ecs.version:*

description: This rule checks to make sure the `event.kind` field only contains allowed values.
name: ECS Check: event.kind allowed values
query: event.kind:* and not event.kind:alert and not event.kind:event and not event.kind:metric and not event.kind:state and not event.kind:pipeline_error and not event.kind:signal

description: This rule checks to make sure the `event.category` field only contains allowed values.
name: ECS Check: event.category allowed values
query: event.category:* and not event.category:authentication and not event.category:configuration and not event.category:database and not event.category:driver and not event.category:file and not event.category:host and not event.category:iam and not event.category:intrusion_detection and not event.category:malware and not event.category:network and not event.category:package and not event.category:process and not event.category:registry and not event.category:session and not event.category:web

description: This rule checks to make sure the `event.outcome` field only contains allowed values.
name: ECS Check: event.outcome allowed values
query: event.outcome:* and not event.outcome:failure and not event.outcome:success and not event.outcome:unknown

description: This rule checks to make sure the `event.type` field only contains allowed values.
name: ECS Check: event.type allowed values
query: event.type:* and not event.type:access and not event.type:admin and not event.type:allowed and not event.type:change and not event.type:connection and not event.type:creation and not event.type:deletion and not event.type:denied and not event.type:end and not event.type:error and not event.type:group and not event.type:info and not event.type:installation and not event.type:protocol and not event.type:start and not event.type:user

description: This rule checks to make sure that `event.type` contains expected values when `event.category` is authentication.
name: ECS Check: expected `event.type` for `event.category` authentication
query: event.category:authentication and event.type:* and not event.type:start and not event.type:end and not event.type:info

description: This rule checks to make sure that `event.type` contains expected values when `event.category` is configuration.
name: ECS Check: expected `event.type` for `event.category` configuration
query: event.category:configuration and event.type:* and not event.type:access and not event.type:change and not event.type:creation and not event.type:deletion and not event.type:info

description: This rule checks to make sure that `event.type` contains expected values when `event.category` is database.
name: ECS Check: expected `event.type` for `event.category` database
query: event.category:database and event.type:* and not event.type:access and not event.type:change and not event.type:info and not event.type:error

description: This rule checks to make sure that `event.type` contains expected values when `event.category` is driver.
name: ECS Check: expected `event.type` for `event.category` driver
query: event.category:driver and event.type:* and not event.type:change and not event.type:end and not event.type:info and not event.type:start

description: This rule checks to make sure that `event.type` contains expected values when `event.category` is file.
name: ECS Check: expected `event.type` for `event.category` file
query: event.category:file and event.type:* and not event.type:change and not event.type:creation and not event.type:deletion and not event.type:info

description: This rule checks to make sure that `event.type` contains expected values when `event.category` is host.
name: ECS Check: expected `event.type` for `event.category` host
query: event.category:host and event.type:* and not event.type:access and not event.type:change and not event.type:end and not event.type:info and not event.type:start

description: This rule checks to make sure that `event.type` contains expected values when `event.category` is iam.
name: ECS Check: expected `event.type` for `event.category` iam
query: event.category:iam and event.type:* and not event.type:admin and not event.type:change and not event.type:creation and not event.type:deletion and not event.type:group and not event.type:info and not event.type:user

description: This rule checks to make sure that `event.type` contains expected values when `event.category` is intrusion_detection.
name: ECS Check: expected `event.type` for `event.category` intrusion_detection
query: event.category:intrusion_detection and event.type:* and not event.type:allowed and not event.type:denied and not event.type:info

description: This rule checks to make sure that `event.type` contains expected values when `event.category` is malware.
name: ECS Check: expected `event.type` for `event.category` malware
query: event.category:malware and event.type:* and not event.type:info

description: This rule checks to make sure that `event.type` contains expected values when `event.category` is network.
name: ECS Check: expected `event.type` for `event.category` network
query: event.category:network and event.type:* and not event.type:access and not event.type:allowed and not event.type:connection and not event.type:denied and not event.type:end and not event.type:info and not event.type:protocol and not event.type:start

description: This rule checks to make sure that `event.type` contains expected values when `event.category` is package.
name: ECS Check: expected `event.type` for `event.category` package
query: event.category:package and event.type:* and not event.type:access and not event.type:change and not event.type:deletion and not event.type:info and not event.type:installation and not event.type:start

description: This rule checks to make sure that `event.type` contains expected values when `event.category` is process.
name: ECS Check: expected `event.type` for `event.category` process
query: event.category:process and event.type:* and not event.type:access and not event.type:change and not event.type:end and not event.type:info and not event.type:start

description: This rule checks to make sure that `event.type` contains expected values when `event.category` is registry.
name: ECS Check: expected `event.type` for `event.category` registry
query: event.category:registry and event.type:* and not event.type:access and not event.type:change and not event.type:creation and not event.type:deletion

description: This rule checks to make sure that `event.type` contains expected values when `event.category` is session.
name: ECS Check: expected `event.type` for `event.category` session
query: event.category:session and event.type:* and not event.type:start and not event.type:end and not event.type:info

description: This rule checks to make sure that `event.type` contains expected values when `event.category` is web.
name: ECS Check: expected `event.type` for `event.category` web
query: event.category:web and event.type:* and not event.type:access and not event.type:error and not event.type:info
